import sys
N, A, B = map(int, input().split())

if N * A < B:
    print(N * A) 
else:
    print(B)


a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())
print(min(a*c, b*d))

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(min(a*b, c))

N, c, d = map(int, input().split())
print(min(c*N, d))

import sys

A, B = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())

if A < B:
    print("0")
else:
    print(A - B)

print("Hello world")


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(min(c, a*b))


N, c, d = map(int, input().split())  # считывание через пробел
print(min(c*N, d))  # вывод
